alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 1:59AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Mitchell, southwestern Jewell, southern Smith, northern Osborne and southeastern Phillips Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 159 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Athol to near Cedar to near Kirwin. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Athol and Cedar around 205 AM CDT. Smith Center and Gaylord around 210 AM CDT. Harlan around 215 AM CDT. Bellaire around 220 AM CDT. Portis around 225 AM CDT. Osborne and Downs around 235 AM CDT. Cawker City around 240 AM CDT. Ionia around 245 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
